text.section:
A member of a savings and loan association means a holder, as shown on the association's records, of:
One or more savings accounts, as to a mutual association; and
One or more shares of capital stock, as to a capital stock association.

section.section: Multiple holders of a single account or share of capital stock shall be considered a single member.
Notice to one holder of a multiple name account or share of capital stock is sufficient notice to all holders.
